common

Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.Utilities

  • public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    The class contents common utilities for blockcipher and rsa packages.
    Version:
    2.0. Code for the class is adopted and modified from: https://github.com/o083to/rsa/blob/master/src/main/java/algoritm/rsa/RSAUtils.java https://github.com/o083to/rsa/blob/master/src/main/java/algoritm/utils/CipherUtils.java By o083to (Accessed in March 2018)
    Author:
    Svetoslav Mihovski.
